stop 'failing test' # FIXME

chezmoi --force remove $HOME${/}.bashrc
! exists $HOME/.bashrc
exists $HOME/.inputrc
exists $HOME/.ssh/config

chezmoi --force remove $HOME${/}.ssh
exists $HOME/.inputrc
! exists $HOME/.ssh/config

! chezmoi --force remove $HOME${/}.bashrc $HOME${/}.inputrc
stdout 'not in source state'
exists $HOME/.inputrc

-- home/user/.bashrc --
# contents of .bashrc
-- home/user/.inputrc --
# contents of .inputrc
-- home/user/.ssh/config --
# contents of .ssh/config
-- home/user/.local/share/chezmoi/dot_bashrc --
# contents of .bashrc
-- home/user/.local/share/chezmoi/dot_inputrc --
# contents of .inputrc
-- home/user/.local/share/chezmoi/private_dot_ssh/config --
# contents of .ssh/config
